div.p: The full list of supported search parameters are can be accessed at DAF Requestor conformance expectations and DAF Responder conformance expectations.

Queries on Medication resource are expected to be within the context of a Medication Statement, Medication Administration, Medication Prescription or Medication Dispense resource query. The following are example usage scenarios for the DAFMedication profile:

ul.li: Query for Medications with a particular ingredient
Query for Medications based on commercial name
Query for Medications based on Medication Material

div.p: There is no additional profile specific implementation guidance, please refer to DAF FHIR IG for implementation guidance common to all profiles.
